properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 10:43PM EST until February 11 at 11:48AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...

Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax
Counties.
Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County.
Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County.

The Lower Roanoke at Randolph, and Dan River from Paces to
South Boston remain in flood.  However, the water level along
both rivers is falling. No new flooding is expected.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Dan River at South Boston.
* until Tuesday morning.
* at 10PM Sunday the stage was 29.5 feet.

* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by Monday
late evening.
* Impact...at 29.5 feet...Route 501 begins to flood and number of
businesses in the Riverdale area are affected.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 30.2
feet on Apr 27 2017.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Graphical forecast information is available on the internet at
http://www.weather.gov/rnk (lower case). Click on 'rivers & lakes'.


The next scheduled statement will be issued around 5AM Monday.
